title: art: Death And Oxxos
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:old-money-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dia-de-muertos]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

Artwork I made based on [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6755 SCP-6755] aka "A Promise to the Pale Lady" by [[*user kilerpoyo]]

//"...but in this country nothing can be said to be certain, except Death and Oxxos."//


[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image https://i.ibb.co/khFp91K/Death-and-Oxxos-SCP-6755.png width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

When inquired by the cashier about why she was wearing //calavera// make-up if it was not Day of the Dead, SCP-6755 replied: "//En México todos los días son Día de Muertos//"[[footnote]]In Mexico every day is Day of the Dead [[/footnote]].

[[/div]]

@@ @@
